headline: Rep. Jim Jordan on Durham Filing: ‘President Trump Was Right … He Was Being Spied On’
sentences:
‘They were trying to frame the president of the United States and it goes right to the Clinton campaign’
RUSH EXCERPT:
JORDAN: "Yeah.
Each time the those statements were made the press around Democrats, no, no, that is not true.
President Trump was right when he said in 2017 he was being spied on.
He said spying took place, basis for his concern about the spying.
No I think the first takeaway we were right about this all along.
He put it out the fact it goes right to the Clinton campaign.”
Now of course Durham has more than confirmed that.
